# Security
- Follow space law, it is in your favor. - Declare your intent before taking action. Don't just open fire. - Do not use contraband as security roles unless there is an immidiate round ending threat (blob, zombies, nukies, or ascended heretic). - Beatings are fine if the offender deserves them. - Remember to escelate. - You are a enforcer for a dystopian company, you can act like it. - You may accept bribes, but only to an extent. Examples below.
## Bribe Examples - Accepting payment for your service weapon is fine. - Accepting payment to look the other way is fine. - Accepting payment to frame someone is fine. - Do not accept payment to kill someone. - Do not accept payment to betray security. - You cannot "join the syndicate" or simmilar actions.
